author: donaldp
msg: Made it so that the embeddor will stop running if there are zero applications in the kernel. It will wake up once a second to check for this condition.

author: donaldp
msg: Made sure kernel is exported using management interface.

author: donaldp
msg: Made Kernel implement a kernel Management interface.
Also made sure that if you tred to remove an application that was not loaded that it would fail.

author: donaldp
msg: Make sure that installation extracts all contents of jar except for those contents in SAR-INF/classes
Make sure that the application will use the assembly.xml file extracted onto filesystem
